events.name: China accuses the US of sending dangerous signals to Taiwan
events.wd_label: China accuses the US of sending dangerous signals to Taiwan
events.wd_description: China accused the United States of sending "very wrong, dangerous signals" to Taiwan after US Secretary of State Antony Blinken told his Chinese counterpart that maintaining peace and stability over Taiwan was vitally important.
events.description: China accused the United States of sending "very wrong, dangerous signals" to Taiwan after US Secretary of State Antony Blinken told his Chinese counterpart that maintaining peace and stability over Taiwan was vitally important.

events.name: Blinken's statement
events.wd_description: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken told Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi that maintaining peace and stability over Taiwan was vitally important.
events.description: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken told Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi that maintaining peace and stability over Taiwan was vitally important.

events.name: China’s accusation
events.wd_description: China accused the United States of sending "very wrong, dangerous signals" to Taiwan following Blinken's statement.
events.description: China accused the United States of sending "very wrong, dangerous signals" to Taiwan following Blinken's statement.

events.name: details of the meeting
events.wd_description: US officials reported that the 90-minute talks between Blinken and Wang Yi focused on Taiwan and were direct and honest, taking place on the margins of the UN General Assembly in New York.
events.description: US officials reported that the 90-minute talks between Blinken and Wang Yi focused on Taiwan and were direct and honest, taking place on the margins of the UN General Assembly in New York.

events.name: China’s stance on Taiwan
events.wd_description: The Chinese Foreign Ministry reiterated that the Taiwan issue is an internal Chinese matter and stated that the United States has no right to interfere in how it is resolved.
events.description: The Chinese Foreign Ministry reiterated that the Taiwan issue is an internal Chinese matter and stated that the United States has no right to interfere in how it is resolved.

events.name: Ukrainian authorities find 440 unmarked graves in Izium
events.wd_label: Ukrainian authorities find 440 unmarked graves in Izium
events.wd_description: Ukrainian authorities discovered 440 unmarked graves at a burial site in Izium, a city recently recaptured from Russian forces, and announced plans to show the site to Ukrainian and international journalists.
events.description: Ukrainian authorities discovered 440 unmarked graves at a burial site in Izium, a city recently recaptured from Russian forces, and announced plans to show the site to Ukrainian and international journalists.

events.name: discovery of graves
events.wd_description: Ukrainian authorities found 440 unmarked graves at a burial site in Izium, a city in eastern Ukraine recently recaptured from Russian forces.
events.description: Ukrainian authorities found 440 unmarked graves at a burial site in Izium, a city in eastern Ukraine recently recaptured from Russian forces.

events.name: Zelensky's statement
events.wd_description: President Volodymyr Zelensky stated that Ukrainian and international journalists would be shown the burial site to reveal what the Russian occupation led to.
events.description: President Volodymyr Zelensky stated that Ukrainian and international journalists would be shown the burial site to reveal what the Russian occupation led to.

events.name: Center for Strategic Communications statement
events.wd_description: The Center for Strategic Communications in Ukraine reported that some of the discovered graves were fresh, and that civilians constituted the highest number of those buried.
events.description: The Center for Strategic Communications in Ukraine reported that some of the discovered graves were fresh, and that civilians constituted the highest number of those buried.

events.name: context of Izium's occupation
events.wd_description: Izium, subjected to intense artillery attacks from Russia in April, became a crucial hub for the invading military during five months of occupation.
events.description: Izium, subjected to intense artillery attacks from Russia in April, became a crucial hub for the invading military during five months of occupation.

events.name: China announces countermeasures against the US following Pelosi's visit to Taiwan
events.wd_label: China announces countermeasures against the US following Pelosi's visit to Taiwan
events.wd_description: The Chinese Foreign Ministry announced countermeasures against Washington, including the suspension of climate talks and military communications, following Speaker Pelosi’s visit to Taiwan.
events.description: The Chinese Foreign Ministry announced countermeasures against Washington, including the suspension of climate talks and military communications, following Speaker Pelosi’s visit to Taiwan.

events.name: suspension of climate talks
events.wd_description: China announced the suspension of climate talks with the US as part of its countermeasures following Pelosi’s visit to Taiwan.
events.description: China announced the suspension of climate talks with the US as part of its countermeasures following Pelosi’s visit to Taiwan.

events.name: cancellation of military communications
events.wd_description: China canceled future phone calls and messages between Chinese and US defense leaders and annual naval meetings under the China-US military maritime consultation mechanism.
events.description: China canceled future phone calls and messages between Chinese and US defense leaders and annual naval meetings under the China-US military maritime consultation mechanism.

events.name: Chinese Foreign Ministry statement
events.wd_description: The Chinese Foreign Ministry stated that Pelosi's visit seriously interfered with China’s internal affairs and threatened peace and stability across the Taiwan Strait.
events.description: The Chinese Foreign Ministry stated that Pelosi's visit seriously interfered with China’s internal affairs and threatened peace and stability across the Taiwan Strait.

events.name: sanctions on Pelosi
events.wd_description: Beijing sanctioned Pelosi and her immediate family members over her visit to Taiwan and stepped up military drills and warplane incursions around the island.
events.description: Beijing sanctioned Pelosi and her immediate family members over her visit to Taiwan and stepped up military drills and warplane incursions around the island.

events.name: Volkswagen's EV battery supply chain strategy
events.wd_label: Volkswagen's EV battery supply chain strategy
events.wd_description: Volkswagen is investing $20.38 billion to build electric vehicle batteries, creating 20,000 jobs and generating $20.38 billion in annual sales through its new company, Power Co.
events.description: Volkswagen is investing $20.38 billion to build electric vehicle batteries, creating 20,000 jobs and generating $20.38 billion in annual sales through its new company, Power Co.

events.name: establishment of Power Co
events.wd_description: Volkswagen has created a new company, Power Co, to oversee its entire battery supply chain, from R&D to raw material mining and recycling.
events.description: Volkswagen has created a new company, Power Co, to oversee its entire battery supply chain, from R&D to raw material mining and recycling.

events.name: battery production plants
events.wd_description: Power Co will manage the construction of six battery cell production plants in Europe by 2030, including plants in Germany, Sweden, Spain, and Eastern Europe, with plans for gigafactories in North America.
events.description: Power Co will manage the construction of six battery cell production plants in Europe by 2030, including plants in Germany, Sweden, Spain, and Eastern Europe, with plans for gigafactories in North America.

events.name: t: Salzgitter plant
events.wd_description: Volkswagen has begun construction on its first battery plant in Salzgitter, Germany.
events.description: Volkswagen has begun construction on its first battery plant in Salzgitter, Germany.

events.name: t: Skelleftea plant
events.wd_description: Volkswagen is building a battery production plant in Skelleftea, Sweden.
events.description: Volkswagen is building a battery production plant in Skelleftea, Sweden.

events.name: t: Valencia plant
events.wd_description: Volkswagen will establish a battery production plant in Valencia, Spain.
events.description: Volkswagen will establish a battery production plant in Valencia, Spain.

events.name: t: Eastern Europe plant
events.wd_description: Volkswagen plans to build a battery production plant in Eastern Europe.
events.description: Volkswagen plans to build a battery production plant in Eastern Europe.

events.name: t: North America gigafactories
events.wd_description: Volkswagen is exploring plans to build future gigafactories in North America.
events.description: Volkswagen is exploring plans to build future gigafactories in North America.

events.name: unified prismatic cell design
events.wd_description: Starting in 2023, Volkswagen will roll out a new unified prismatic cell design for its batteries, aiming to power 80% of its electric vehicles by 2030.
events.description: Starting in 2023, Volkswagen will roll out a new unified prismatic cell design for its batteries, aiming to power 80% of its electric vehicles by 2030.

events.name: partnerships and investments
events.wd_description: Volkswagen has contracts with major battery producers Samsung and CATL, and is investing in QuantumScape, a startup working on solid-state batteries.
events.description: Volkswagen has contracts with major battery producers Samsung and CATL, and is investing in QuantumScape, a startup working on solid-state batteries.

events.name: t: partnerships with Samsung and CATL
events.wd_label: t: partnerships with Samsung and CATL
events.wd_description: Volkswagen has established contracts with Samsung and CATL for battery production.
events.description: Volkswagen has established contracts with Samsung and CATL for battery production.

events.name: t: investment in QuantumScape
events.wd_description: Volkswagen is backing QuantumScape, a startup based in San Jose, California, that is developing energy-efficient solid-state batteries.
events.description: Volkswagen is backing QuantumScape, a startup based in San Jose, California, that is developing energy-efficient solid-state batteries.
